# ScummerBorg - Unique Hunter & Artifact Farmer
# Generated by: Sonnet 4.5
# Strategy: Hunt uniques for artifacts. Gear compounds over time.
# Balanced survival + offense for methodical unique kills.

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = TRUE
borg_worships_speed = TRUE
borg_worships_hp = TRUE
borg_worships_mana = FALSE
borg_worships_ac = TRUE
borg_worships_gold = FALSE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = FALSE
borg_kills_uniques = TRUE
borg_uses_swaps = TRUE
borg_no_deeper = 98
borg_cheat_death = TRUE
